>
[Shobhad Longrifle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=251)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Backstabber" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=172" />
<trait label="Concussive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=401" />
<trait label="Fatal d12" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=178" />
<trait label="Kickback" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=409" />
<trait label="Volley" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=201" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 20 gp

**Damage** 1d8 P

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 2

**Range** 120 ft.

**Reload** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Category** Martial

**Group** [Firearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=16)
</row>

</column>

---

The shobhad longrifle is a firearm with a long, rifled barrel. Often mounted with a multi-lensed scope for targeting at an array of ranges and a chambering mechanism that can adjust the speed and penetrating power of each shot, it's the preferred weapon of many [shobhad](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=296) warriors. Shobhad longrifles are equipped with a built-in [silencer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1206) so they make no more noise than a crossbow when fired. A shobhad longrifle is a martial weapon.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-16" />
